git.commitMessage: feat: Enable team swap and kick player in all game phases

sprint: Sprint 4 - Code Optimization, UX Improvements & Social Features
currentPhases: phase4.7 - Cold Start Optimizations & Railway Free Tier ✅
phase4.8 - Profile & Social Features Bug Fixes ✅
phase4.9 - Trick Winner Positioning & Team Management ✅
recentChanges: Cold start optimizations for Railway free tier (512 MB RAM)
RAM monitoring every 30 seconds with console warnings
Server health metrics in Debug Panel (heap, RSS, uptime, active games)
Fixed profile display not updating after save
Fixed unfinished game stats errors with optional chaining
Fixed duplicate name display on homepage
Fixed avatar 404 errors with ID/emoji/URL detection
Added Friends tab to Social section with online/offline status
Fixed Login/Register buttons always visible for guests
Trick winner banner positioned at winning card location
Confetti spreads radially from winning card center (20 particles)
Team swap enabled in all game phases
Kick player enabled in all game phases
Team order (1-2-1-2) automatically enforced after position swap
keyFeatures: Component extraction and bundle optimization (78% reduction)
Railway free tier optimizations with cold start handling
Enhanced social features with Friends integration
Flexible team management in all game phases
Comprehensive bug fixes for profiles and avatars
notes: Major optimizations for Railway free tier deployment
Improved social integration with Friends tab
Flexible team management across all game phases
All builds passing, ready for production deployment
